ProcessPlanner class

class ProcessPlanner.ProcessPlanner(initial_path_problem, initial_process_state=None)

Bases: object

Acts as an interface for handling events. Keeps track of the building process with the:class:~ProcessState class and provides robot commands. Handles calculation of a new solution in case of a detour event.

Parameters

  • initial_path_problem¶ – Todo: Documentation

  • initial_process_state¶ – Todo: Documentation

  • optimization_weights¶ –

  • algorithm¶ –

  • event_code¶ (int) – See :meth: event_code in ProcessState.evaluate_placement <~ProcessState.evaluate_placement>

  • event_info¶ –

static determine_picking_robot_commands(event_code, process_state, layout=None)
Parameters

  • event_code¶ (int) – See :meth: event_code in ProcessState.evaluate_placement <~ProcessState.evaluate_placement>

  • layout¶ – The current layout.

handle_detour_event(detour_event, process_state)

Handles the detour event, applies new solution if found. :param _sphinx_paramlinks_ProcessPlanner.ProcessPlanner.handle_detour_event.process_state: The current process state. :type _sphinx_paramlinks_ProcessPlanner.ProcessPlanner.handle_detour_event.process_state: ProcessState :param _sphinx_paramlinks_ProcessPlanner.ProcessPlanner.handle_detour_event.detour_event: Dictionary containing a trail and building instruction of the deviated layout. :type _sphinx_paramlinks_ProcessPlanner.ProcessPlanner.handle_detour_event.detour_event: class_types.BuildingInstructions

Returns

A tuple containing a string message and a modified state with the new solution applied (tuple [str], [ProcessState]).

handle_detour_trails(process_state)

Handles current detour trails and decides if the currently aimed solution should return to a previous iteration.

:param _sphinx_paramlinks_ProcessPlanner.ProcessPlanner.handle_detour_trails.process_state ProcessState: The current process state.

Returns

An optional str message if the currently aimed solution was changed to a previous one.

main(motion_event, handle_detour_events=True, ignore_part_check=False, ignore_obstructions=False)

Main method of ProcessPlanning. Takes worker_event as input and sends information about the event to ProcessState. Prints message output of ProcessState and handles detour events.

Parameters

  • motion_event¶ (special_type.MotionEvent) – A tuple containing event position and event code. Contains a part ID instead of a position in case of a pick event.

  • main.¶( (ignore_obstructions) – obj`bool`): If set to true, detour events will result in the process planner looking for a new solution.

  • main.¶( – obj`bool`): If set to true, part restrictions will be ignored. Will lead to unwanted behaviour.

  • main.¶( – obj`bool`): If set to true, obstructions will be ignored. Untested. Will lead to unwanted behaviour.

Returns

ProcessOutput containing processed information regarding the event and current process state.

optimal_solution

optimal solution for the initial path problem

return_to_previous_state()

Returns to previous state.

ProcessPlanner.make_placement_messages(event_info)

Sends a new placement/removal event to be evaluated and registered in current ProcessState.
